entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16 except 11 near the lake.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 16 except 11 near the lake. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 12.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. High 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
